column4: What does does winff use to play/preview video (xvid) and why doesn't vlc play it?
you need the xvid / divx plugin for vlc
where do I get it? third party source?
yeah, think you need to enable all 3rd party sources , the plugin avifile-xvid-plugin , should work
thank you. installing avidemux and a few other packages right now
well, some video codec etensions are misnamed , it's happened to me in the past
not sure what you mean, I shared the info and you can always /msg ubottu !factoid to see for yourself :)
oh, I see what you mean.
If you have an issue with how one of the ops does things please feel free and welcome to join #ubuntu-ops and let us know.
otherwise please keep the offtopic commentary to yourself
it's not serious ...was making a funny
there was some spculation about netflix on ubuntu via the chromium browser using html5
methinks you need to lighten up a little
other languages besides French use accents
